Uses of Class
org.jamesframework.core.search.SingleNeighbourhoodSearch

  • Packages that use SingleNeighbourhoodSearch 
    Package Description
    org.jamesframework.core.search.algo
    Algorithm implementations.
    org.jamesframework.core.search.algo.tabu
    Tabu search and components (including tabu memory specification).

    • Uses of SingleNeighbourhoodSearch in org.jamesframework.core.search.algo

      Subclasses of SingleNeighbourhoodSearch in org.jamesframework.core.search.algo 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MetropolisSearch<SolutionType extends Solution>
      Metropolis search (fixed temperature).
      class  ParallelTempering<SolutionType extends Solution>
      The parallel tempering algorithm uses several Metropolis search replicas with different temperatures in a given range, where good solutions are pushed towards cool replicas for the sake of convergence, while bad solutions are pushed towards hot replicas in an attempt to find further improvements.
      class  RandomDescent<SolutionType extends Solution>
      Basic random descent algorithm.
      class  SteepestDescent<SolutionType extends Solution>
      Steepest descent algorithm, also referred to as hill climbing.

    • Uses of SingleNeighbourhoodSearch in org.jamesframework.core.search.algo.tabu

      Subclasses of SingleNeighbourhoodSearch in org.jamesframework.core.search.algo.tabu 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TabuSearch<SolutionType extends Solution>
      Tabu search algorithm.
